maingui.RFSource.RadioInterface.radio_interface module¶

maingui.RFSource.RadioInterface.radio_interface.radio_backend(zmq_source, radio, frequency, sampling_rate)[source]¶

Capture data from Gnu Radio backend :param zmq_source: The ZMQ Address, full TCP host and port :param radio: The radio Hardware to use :param frequency: The center Frequency (Hz) :param sampling_rate: The sampling rate (Hz) :return:
